keyEvents.title: Monster Trio vs Kraken
keyEvents.description: The Monster Trio battles and defeats the Kraken in the deep sea.
keyEvents.significance: First major battle showcasing post-timeskip abilities.

keyEvents.title: Entering the Undersea Volcanic Region
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny enters a dangerous area filled with undersea volcanoes and massive sea creatures.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangers of the deep sea route to Fish-Man Island.

keyEvents.title: Wadatsumi Appears
keyEvents.description: Wadatsumi knocks out a giant anglerfish in the deep sea.
keyEvents.significance: Introduction of a major new character.

keyEvents.title: Flying Dutchman Appears
keyEvents.description: The ghost ship Flying Dutchman emerges in the darkness of the deep sea.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces a major location and foreshadows Vander Decken IX.

description: The deep sea region between the surface and Fish-Man Island, filled with dangerous sea creatures, undersea volcanoes, and darkness. This treacherous area must be navigated by ships in coating bubbles to reach Fish-Man Island.
geography: Deep underwater region characterized by undersea volcanoes, darkness, and massive sea life. Located above Fish-Man Island at 10,000 meters depth.
notableFeatures: Home to massive sea creatures including Kraken, giant anglerfish, and Ankoro
Extreme water pressure requiring bubble coating for ships

reveals.information: The dangerous deep sea region ships must traverse to reach Fish-Man Island
Contains undersea volcanoes and massive predatory creatures

name.japanese: フライング・ダッチマン号

keyEvents.title: Flying Dutchman Appears
keyEvents.description: The ghost ship appears ominously in the deep sea at the end of the episode.
keyEvents.significance: Introduces the Flying Dutchman and creates suspense for Vander Decken IX's arrival.

description: The ghost ship captained by Vander Decken IX. A mysterious and ominous vessel that can travel through the deep sea and is home to the Flying Pirates crew.
notableFeatures: Home base of the Flying Pirates

reveals.information: Ghost ship commanded by Vander Decken IX

keyEvents.title: Caribou Trapped
keyEvents.description: Franky discovers and traps Caribou who was hiding in a barrel on the ship.
keyEvents.significance: Prevents Caribou from harming the crew.

keyEvents.title: Multiple Coup de Burst Uses
keyEvents.description: The Thousand Sunny uses Coup de Burst four times to escape from sea creatures, causing the protective bubble to shrink.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the ship's capabilities and limitations underwater.

keyEvents.title: Giant Anglerfish Attack
keyEvents.description: The ship nearly gets swallowed by a massive anglerfish.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the dangers faced by the crew without the Monster Trio.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' ship, navigating through the dangerous deep sea in a protective coating bubble on the way to Fish-Man Island.
